5.0 out of 5 stars
gog.com game
ByPankaj Dattaram Bhagaton 1 November 2016
Verified Purchase
The game is redeemable only on gog.com in my case if you don't know what is gog.com just google it. I also get rs 200 voucher from G2A from that voucher I purchased Witcher 1 on G2A website. The key also works thanks G2A and amazon

5.0 out of 5 stars
Works and great customer care.. Looking forward to more...
ByParamveer Singh Sethion 17 March 2017
Verified Purchase
Received before time..
Cd works and works great. Got a free game too.. Thank you. Had a issue registering as one of the digits in the end wasnt printed on the code received, but the customer care ( mail ) helped out with the code within an hour of my query.
Looking forward for more purchases.
P.s - You can send the code via mail, lets save paper guys...
Thank you again...

5.0 out of 5 stars
G2A rocks.
ByAmiton 3 December 2016
Verified Purchase
Thank you G2A for such a wonderful game at such an affordable price point. Witcher 2 is a block buster RPG game full of amazing gameplay and decent graphics, the story telling is amazing and leaves you wanting for more. Do play the Witcher Series. Its worth you time, if you like good stories and combat.

4.0 out of 5 stars
It's only a printed serial number without game disc.
Byprranjal s.on 2 April 2016
Verified Purchase
It's only a serial key. So you have to install Steam client on yr device and then from there you can register this serial and get a free download of the original game copy. The game is huge, around 8gigs or so. I haven't yet downloaded it becoz my broadband suffers from that stinky Fair Usage Policy, only 15gigs are faster then it goes down to 256KBPS which is considered Hi speed in India. I 'm trying to find out somebody who might have the dvd for this game so that i can just install it and register it with this serial key.
Comment
